"Date :":"date", - generated
"Time :":"time", - generated 
"User :":"user,uid", - command 'set' 
"PID  : ":"ppid",  - command 'set'
"${application} ":"version",  - menu.properties
"System   :":"os.name,os.version", - System properties
"Hostname : ":"hostname",   - command 'set'
"Hosttype : ":"hosttype",   - command 'set'
"Network  :":"inet", - ifconfig
"User Home : ":"user.home",  - System properties
"Java Home : ":"java_home", - System properties
"JVM :":"java.runtime.version",- System properties
"PWD :":"user.dir" - System properties

//-------------------------------------------------------
---> starting
